overview: Conner Kennedy, a walking date disaster, is terrible at dealing with the ladies. But help is on the way! Sex guide Ron Jeremy tutors him on the "ins & outs" of how to please a woman. It is up to Diana (Katie Morgan), Carolyn (Miranda Miller) and Katie (Alexa Grace) to put his newfound sexual prowess to the test.
tagline: An erotic journey from geek to god
title: Losers Never Get Laid
